name: UBTTask_BlueprintBase
doc:
Base class for blueprint based task nodes. Do NOT use it for creating native c++ classes!

When task receives Abort event, all latent actions associated this instance are being removed.
This prevents from resuming activity started by Execute, but does not handle external events.
Please use them safely (unregister at abort) and call IsTaskExecuting() when in doubt.

TickInterval:
If any of the Tick functions is implemented, how often should they be ticked.
    Values < 0 mean 'every tick'.

methods.name: FinishExecute
methods.doc: finishes task execution with Success or Fail result

methods.name: IsTaskAborting
methods.doc: check if task is currently being aborted

methods.name: IsTaskExecuting
methods.doc: check if task is currently being executed

methods.name: Abort
AbortAI
Execute
ExecuteAI
Tick
TickAI
SetFinishOnMessage
methods.doc: task execution will be finished (with result 'Success') after receiving specified message

methods.name: SetFinishOnMessageWithId
methods.doc: task execution will be finished (with result 'Success') after receiving specified message with indicated ID
